name: Vervet Canned Cocktails
description: VERVET is a craft cocktail bar in a can. We deliver a premium California experience with sparkling farm-to-can cocktails, with and without alcohol.
one_liner: VERVET is a craft cocktail bar in a can. We deliver a premium California experience with sparkling farm-to-can cocktails, with and without alcohol.
